data.title: New York Knicks Roster
data.meta_description: New York Knicks scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Renaldo Balkman was selected as the #20 pick in the First Round of the 2006 NBA Draft by the New York Knicks. Renaldo Balkman signed a multi-year contract with the New York Knicks on July 5, 2006.

Wilson Chandler was selected as the #23 pick in the First Round of the 2007 NBA Draft by the New York Knicks. Wilson Chandler signed a multi-year contract with the New York Knicks on July 27, 2007.

Mardy Collins was selected as the #29 pick in the First Round of the 2006 NBA Draft by the New York Knicks. Mardy Collins signed a multi-year contract with the New York Knicks on July 5, 2006.

David Lee was selected as the #30 pick in the First Round of the 2005 NBA Draft by the New York Knicks. David Lee signed a multi-year contract with the New York Knicks on July 1, 2005.

Jamal Crawford was acquired in a sign and trade by the New York Knicks from the Chicago Bulls on August 5, 2004.

Eddy Curry was acquired in a sign and trade by the New York Knicks from the Chicago Bulls on October 4, 2005.

Fred Jones was acquired in a trade by the New York Knicks from the Portland Trail Blazers on June 28, 2007.

Stephon Marbury was acquired in a trade by the New York Knicks from the Phoenix Suns on January 5, 2004.

Zach Randolph was acquired in a trade by the New York Knicks from the Portland Trail Blazers on June 28, 2007.

Quentin Richardson was acquired in a trade by the New York Knicks from the Phoenix Suns on June 28, 2005.

Malik Rose was acquired in a trade by the New York Knicks from the San Antonio Spurs on February 24, 2005.
